text: The Supreme Military Majlis ul-Shura of the United Mujahideen Forces of the Caucasus is a terrorist organization that unites terrorists from various North Caucasus states. The group was created in 2001. In 2005, it merged with the State Defense Committee of the Chechen Republic of Ichkeria (ChRI) rebranding into the “State Defense Committee - Majlis ul-Shura of the ChRI” ("GKO - Majlis ul-Shura of the ChRI"). The group supports a Jihadist Wahhabist ideology. It was designated as a terrorist organization by Russia in 2003. ==References== Category:Terrorism
title:
Supreme Military Majlis ul-Shura of the United Mujahideen Forces of the
Caucasus
